1. List all flights that were delayed more than 30 minutes on departure.

```{sql}
#| connection: con
#| eval: true
#| echo: true

SELECT(1.0 *
(SELECT COUNT(*) AS engine
FROM planes
WHERE engine = 'Turbo-fan')
/
(SELECT COUNT(*) AS engine
FROM planes
WHERE engine = 'Turbo-jet')
)
```
